Package org.mvplugins.multiverse.core.utils.result

Class Attempt.Failure<T,F extends FailureReason>

java.lang.Object
org.mvplugins.multiverse.core.utils.result.Attempt.Failure<T,F>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of the value.
F - The type of failure reason.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Attempt<T,F>
Enclosing interface:
Attempt<T,F extends FailureReason>
public static final class Attempt.Failure<T,F extends FailureReason> extends Object implements Attempt<T,F>
Represents a failed attempt with a reason.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.mvplugins.multiverse.core.utils.result.Attempt

    Attempt.Failure<T,F extends FailureReason>, Attempt.Success<T,F extends FailureReason>

    • toTry

      public io.vavr.control.Try<T> toTry(Function<Attempt.Failure<T,F>,Throwable> throwableFunction)
      Description copied from interface: Attempt
      Converts this attempt to a Try instance. If this attempt represents a failure, the provided exception supplier will be invoked to create a failed try.
      Specified by:
      toTry in interface Attempt<T,F extends FailureReason>
      Parameters:
      throwableFunction - A function that provides a throwable in case of failure.
      Returns:
